objects.text:
• MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND
• 100+ HOURS WIRELESS PLAYTIME
• RUGGED & FOLDABLE DESIGN
• WIRELESS CHARGING

product_details.description: True icons never die; they just get better with time. Major V is no different. From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined. Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure. MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND: Thunderous bass, smooth mids and crisp treble. Major V delivers the Marshall signature sound you know and love. 100+ HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYTIME: Your next adventure awaits, and Major V is in for the ride. Packing 100+ hours of wireless playtime, you can be gone for days. RUGGED AND FOLDABLE DESIGN: Rugged so that it lasts. Foldable for compact storage. Major is an instant classic for the fifth time running. CUSTOMISABLE M-BUTTON: Instantly access the Spotify Tap default function or your EQ settings or voice assistant thanks to Major V’s M-button and the Marshall Bluetooth app WIRELESS CHARGING: We don’t like wires either, they just get in the way. Thanks to wireless charging, it’s simple to give Major V a boost when needed. Brand - Marshall ** Color - Black ** Ear Placement - On Ear ** Form Factor - On Ear ** Noise Control - None **

banner_details:
This banner features a bold, modern layout promoting a pair of high-end Bluetooth headphones. The design uses a segmented, dark grid background enhanced with subtle circular highlights and dotted accents. The top-left area contains prominent branding and product name text layers (“heading” and “subheading”), followed by a smaller tagline (“tagline”). Four key product features are listed in a bullet layout through the “description” layer. The bottom section includes a highlighted price (“price”) in bold typography and a vibrant call-to-action button (“cta_button_background” and “cta”) encouraging user engagement. The right side showcases the product prominently via the “product_image” layer.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Graphite Gray: `#262626`
- Deep Black: `#121212`
- Gold Yellow: `#D4AF37`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gray: `#AAAAAA`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, matte-black Marshall headphone with a classic vintage vibe. The dominant color is deep black (#000000), highlighted by textured leather finishes and smooth matte surfaces that create visual depth. The white "Marshall" logo (#FFFFFF) pops against the dark backdrop, maintaining brand visibility. A subtle gold accent (#D4AF37) near the base adds a touch of luxury without overwhelming the minimalist design. These colors are cohesively blended, with black establishing a bold base, white providing contrast, and gold offering a rich, premium feel. This palette translates well into an advertisement emphasizing importance, elegance, and audio excellence.
